text: here's a really fun idea from our
October issue isn't that a beautiful
cover I love it
it's werewolf paws all you need are some
Madeleine's you can make your own I have
a recipe on the website or you can buy
them I like to make them consumerist but
I know it's easier to buy them chocolate
frosting and some slivered almonds take
your chocolate frosting about two
tablespoons for every Madeline spread it
a little bit thicker at the back and a
little thinner at the front over your
cookies then you take your knife and
sort of make a far like pattern because
these are werewolf paws with the tip of
your knife don't need to be perfect here
but you can see where I'm going with
that right looks like fur me mean we're
over and then take five of your slivered
almonds and stick them into the front to
make the claws mean werewolf's I mean
I'm trying to make werewolf's the new
vampires how's that going for me they're
cute and really easy right I'll make
another one the frosting is really soft
right now but if you let it sit
uncovered for a little while it'll
harden up a little bit which will make
it a little bit less messy to eat the
thicker that your frosting is the more
it looks like fur oh there we go now
I've got the hang of it once you make a
few you really get it down oh wait a sec
I just discovered something you have to
put the the rounded side up for most
claw like appearance and there you have
it it's
easy super fun tree for Halloween enjoy
